show.title: Pudhaiyunda Thamizhagam
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/SWdyys
show.description: Kal thondri man thondra kalathe mun thondriya ulagin mootha kudigal aana thamizhargalin varalaatrai aathara poorvamaaga ulagukku eduthu solbavai agazvaaivugal koorum seithigal thaan. Nila Matrum Aazh Kadal Agazhaivugal moolam kidaitha thol porutkalai kondu Karkala Thamizhagam thodangi  Sangakala thamizhagam matrum Varalatru kaala thamizhagam varaikkum makkalin samuga Porulathara Panpattu nilaiyai aathaara poorvamaaga eduthu solgiradhu indha Audio Puthagam. Puthainthu Pona Varalatrai Therinthu Kolla Ninaikkum Ovvoruvarum Nichayam Ketka Vendiya Audio Puthagam Idhu.
show.description_secondary: Kal thondri man thondra kalathe mun thondriya ulagin mootha kudigal aana thamizhargalin varalaatrai aathara poorvamaaga ulagukku eduthu solbavai agazvaaivugal koorum seithigal thaan. Nila Matrum Aazh Kadal Agazhaivugal moolam kidaitha thol porutkalai kondu Karkala Thamizhagam thodangi  Sangakala thamizhagam matrum Varalatru kaala thamizhagam varaikkum makkalin samuga Porulathara Panpattu nilaiyai aathaara poorvamaaga eduthu solgiradhu indha Audio Puthagam. Puthainthu Pona Varalatrai Therinthu Kolla Ninaikkum Ovvoruvarum Nichayam Ketka Vendiya Audio Puthagam Idhu.

episodes.title: 36. Agazhaivugal Kattum Idai Kala Samuga Nilai
